description: Dr. Mrigank Shekhar Jha is one of the most experienced urologists and kidney transplant specialists. He has more than 27 years of active medical practice. Dr. Jha has undertaken many senior positions in a few of the most acclaimed hospitals in India. His expertise has been developed in advanced urology, uro-oncology, kidney transplantation, and many other urological specialties. This work attitude toward innovation in urology has earned the doctor many accolades and recognitions.
